content: S-WW (1000 hr SST) Single winged self-drilling screw with superior corrosion resistance to fasten untreated wood to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Corrosion resistance tested to 1000 hours of salt-spray testing as per ASTM B117 Fast and robust drill tip Wings prevent thread engagement in wood Applications Fastening wood/untreated plywood to steel framing (up to 4 ga or 3 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Wafer head Screw drive/recess type: Phillips head Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Wafer head | Screw drive/recess type | Phillips head | Collated | No | Product Class | Premium | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 18 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 2297635 - Self-drill screw 12-24x21/2 PFH4 (CRC) - Package Size 1500 pc - 2297636 - Self-drill screw 1/4-20x23/4 PFH4 (CRC) - Package Size 1000 pc
